description:
Luffy and Captain Foxy go toe-to-toe in a brutal battle waged aboard a booby trapped boat. Luffy is fighting for his crew, but Captain Foxy`s dirty tricks have him on the ropes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full-Blast Slow-Slow Onslaught vs. Invulnerable Luffy!
Ramollo Beam à plein gaz contre Luffy l’invincible
Rubber e i travestimenti di Foxy
Zenkai Noro Noro Kougeki VS Fujimi no Luffy
การจู่โจมสุดเอื่อยเฉื่อย! ปะทะ ลูฟี่อมตะ!
全開ノロノロ攻撃 VS 不死身のルフィ
